FuncDef: The display mpls mldp lsp statistics command displays LDP signaling statistics about mLDP P2MP LSPs.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view LDP signaling statistics about mLDP P2MP LSPs, run the display mpls mldp lsp statistics command on each node.
Precautions
On a bud node that functions as both a transit node and a leaf node on an mLDP P2MP LSP, statistics contain only bud LSP information, but do not contain transit or egress LSP statistics.
